name: Spiritual Successor
description:
Based on the theme for Epic MegaJam 2020 "It's been a long time, but we're not done yet", Spiritual Successor tells the story of a family separated by generations but closely linked by a series of catastrophes. Play as each of the family members and help them lift a heavy curse.

CONTROLS

W, A, S, D — Movement

Mouse — Control Camera, Interact

1 — Activate Primary Ability

2 — Active Secondary Ability
